name.title: The name for the ingress (and dependent objects)

staticGlobalIP.title: The name of a GCP static IP address object to be assigned to the ingress-created load balancer

frontendConfigSpec.title: The frontendConfigSpec Schema - refers to values for networking.gke.io/v1beta1 FrontendConfig

backendConfigSpec.title: The backendConfigSpec Schema - refers to values for cloud.google.com/v1 BackendConfig

secretName.title: Name of the secret containing the private key

secretMountPath.title: Where to mount the scret inside the container

secretMountSubPath.title: Where to place the secret *inside* of the mounting directory

privateKeySecretKey.title: The key of the private key inside the secret
